name: Web Design
des: Web design focuses on the visual aesthetics and user experience of a website. It involves creating the layout, color scheme, typography, and graphical elements to ensure a visually appealing and engaging website.

name: Web Development
des: Web development involves the creation and maintenance of websites and web applications. It encompasses various skills and technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and backend programming languages.

name: Responsive Design
des: A responsive website is a website that is designed and developed to provide an optimal viewing and user experience across different devices and screen sizes, including .
